project.banking

Class BankStatementAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.banking.BankStatementAnalyzer

  • public class BankStatementAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    The class encapsulates all parsing, processing and exporting functions. Class follows up single responsibility principle: class responsibility is "analyzing";

    • Method Detail

      • analyze

        public void analyze(java.lang.String fileName,
                    BankStatementParser bankStatementParser,
                    Exporter exporter)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Method purpose is to encapsulate actions of parsing, processing and exporting in single event.

        Method's working steps:

        1) Method opens file with corresponding file name;

        2) Parsing it by lines with received BankStatementParser entity;

        3) An instance of ErrorCollector is generating inside the method;

        4) The created list of transactions is passing to the BankStatementProcessor in the constructor;

        5) An instance of SummaryStatistics created using method BankStatementProcessor.createSummaryStatistics();

        6) ErrorCollector is checking list of transactions for errors using method project.banking.ErrorCollector#validate(List);

        7) The Exporter object making export to a file(type of file depends on type of exporter).

        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file which will be analyzed.
        bankStatementParser - instance of BankStatementParser , depends on format of input final.
        exporter - instance of Exporter, this parameter the choice of this parameter depends on the format in which the user wants to export the processing results.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
